feedback:
The plan does not specify how the 'date of joining' field will be validated on the frontend to ensure it does not accept future dates.
Step 4 lacks detail on how the database schema will be updated to include the 'date of joining' field, including any potential migration scripts for existing records.
The plan does not address how the 'date of joining' field will be handled for existing records in the database that do not have this field.
There is no mention of how the frontend will handle error messages for invalid or missing 'date of joining' inputs.
The plan does not specify how the backend will enforce the requirement for the 'date of joining' field for new registrations.
Step 3 should include details on how the backend will handle error responses for invalid 'date of joining' inputs.
